product_name: Nike Dri-Fit Touch Tailwind Shirt - Men's
long_description: Perfect for routine runs or hot races, the Nike Dri-FIT(R) Touch Tailwind Shirt provides runners with a moisture-wicking fabric blend to keep you cool on those hot days. Dri-FIT fabric delivers high-tech moisture management to keep you cool and dry, and feels soft and comfortable against your skin. Underarm gussets and grommets allow for extra ventilation. Droptail hem adds a bit more coverage in back.
short_description: Perfect for routine runs or hot races, the Nike Dri-FIT(R) Touch Tailwind Shirt provides runners with a moisture-wicking fabric blend to keep you cool on those hot days.
